data.name: RoBo: The Allectric Idventurer
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD



About the Game

The first time Ted activated the Dynoporter machine was to save his wife, but he failed.
The second time, failure was not an option.
It was his daughter's life and the entire human race on the line when the deadly virus threat was announced.
Ted had switched on the machine, transferring all humans’ souls into their favorite toys, and sparking the electric mission of Robin and RoBo, to save the human race from the hands of Steve and his Steam Punk Gang.

Join RoBo and Robin's spirit as your clever companion, on a mission to collect the DynoPorter machine parts in order to transfer the humans’ souls back to their bodies.
Together, you will manage RoBo’s energy efficiently, build & use tools and attachments to solve puzzles, and prevail in combat. With Robin's maker-ship nature and your sense of adventure, you will repurpose other toy's parts to your advantage, control other toys, find clever solutions to simple (for a human) tasks, and trick or disable enemies.

Embrace your inner energy and have an impact on the world!
data.about_the_game:
The first time Ted activated the Dynoporter machine was to save his wife, but he failed.
The second time, failure was not an option.
It was his daughter's life and the entire human race on the line when the deadly virus threat was announced.
Ted had switched on the machine, transferring all humans’ souls into their favorite toys, and sparking the electric mission of Robin and RoBo, to save the human race from the hands of Steve and his Steam Punk Gang.

Join RoBo and Robin's spirit as your clever companion, on a mission to collect the DynoPorter machine parts in order to transfer the humans’ souls back to their bodies.
Together, you will manage RoBo’s energy efficiently, build & use tools and attachments to solve puzzles, and prevail in combat. With Robin's maker-ship nature and your sense of adventure, you will repurpose other toy's parts to your advantage, control other toys, find clever solutions to simple (for a human) tasks, and trick or disable enemies.

Embrace your inner energy and have an impact on the world!
data.short_description: In a world where humans’ souls were transferred into toys, plug into RoBo and join Robin, a creative Dyslexic kid, on an electric adventure through her memories & the Solar City. Head into an action-puzzle platformer, where you will be tackled by crazy challenges & overcome the SteamPunk Gang.
